resources.string: Invest in a mix of Reflexes (combat), Intelligence (hacking), and Cool (stealth) early. Avoid over-specializing until Day 10.
Master the Breach Protocol minigame early for free eddies, reduced vendor prices, and bonus components.
Use silenced weapons and non-lethal takedowns; some quests reward sparing enemies.
Slide, dash, and use cover during firefights—staying still makes you an easy target.
Search alleys, dumpsters, and rooftops for Iconic gear and rare crafting specs.
Tag enemies through walls and spot hidden access points or environmental hazards.
Visit Ripperdocs often. Prioritize Mantis Blades or Kerenzikov for combat agility.
Complete gigs and NCPD alerts to unlock better gear, cyberware, and story options.
Save before conversations—choices can unlock unique rewards or alter endings.
Focus on Regina’s gigs for free cyberware or Dakota’s for vehicle discounts.
Upgrade Iconic weapons at Crafting stations—they scale with your level.
Prioritize dismantling gear for crafting components (except paintings—see Day 13).
Buy the "$4,000 painting" from vendors and resell it infinitely for quick eddies.
Craft Armadillo armor mods (Technical Ability) to drastically boost survivability.
Buy the Kusanagi CT-3X bike early for speed and agility in tight spaces.
Pair "Short Circuit" (stun) with "Suicide" or "Cyberpsychosis" for crowd control.
Learn boss tells (e.g., use EMP grenades against Oda) to counter attacks.
Max Intelligence and Breach Protocol to hack enemies through cameras.
Throw objects or use "Whistle" quickhacks to isolate targets silently.
Equip Target Analysis optic mod to farm Street Cred without killing.
Some missions (like "Down on the Street") change based on time of day.
Save before missions, risky jumps, or dialogue choices to avoid regrets.
Use Photo Mode to scout areas for enemies, loot, or alternate paths.
Mix armor mods with stylish clothing—some outfits have hidden perks.
Craft grenades (Technical Ability) to clear rooms or flush out snipers.
Use double-jump or air-dash cyberware to access rooftops and secrets.
Day 27: Max Out a Skill Tree
Specialize in one playstyle (e.g., Blades for 500% crit chance).
Explore Pacifica’s abandoned mall and stadium post-quests for elite loot.
Use the 100k-eddie Tabula E-Rasa to tweak your build for the endgame.
Save manually before the Point of No Return—your choices have lasting consequences.
